verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w habitation|strong="H4186"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w offering|strong="H0801"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* holocaust, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* victim, paying \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w voluntarily|strong="H5071"\w* \w offering|strong="H0801"\w* \w gifts|strong="H0801"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* solemnities burning \w a|strong="H0176"\w* sweet savour unto \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*:

Whosoever immolateth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* victim, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* part \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* ephi, tempered \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* part \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3196"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* shall give \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w same|strong="H0259"\w* measure \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* pour \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* libations \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* holocaust \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* victim. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*,

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H6241"\w* every \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* there shall \w be|strong="H8081"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H1969"\w* hour \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenths, which shall \w be|strong="H8081"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H0176"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w part|strong="H7992"\w* \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w part|strong="H7992"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* same measure \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* libation, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* sweet savour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou offerest \w a|strong="H3588"\w* holocaust \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6381"\w* thy \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* victims \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*,

Thou shalt give \w for|strong="H5921"\w* every \w ox|strong="H1241"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenths \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* libations \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* same measure, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* \w offering|strong="H0801"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* most sweet savour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w Thus|strong="H3602"\w* shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w*:
\w For|strong="H0259"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* ox \w and|strong="H0259"\w* ram \w and|strong="H0259"\w* lamb \w and|strong="H0259"\w* kid.

\w Both|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* born \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* strangers,
\w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* sacrifices \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w same|strong="H3651"\w* rite.

\w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* law \w and|strong="H3068"\w* judgment both \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*.
\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Lord spoke \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Moses, saying:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w When|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w you|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* separate firstfruits \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w Of|strong="H7225"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* things \w you|strong="H0853"\w* eat. \w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w* separate firstfruits \w of|strong="H7225"\w* \w your|strong="H7311"\w* barnfloors:

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w dough|strong="H6182"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w through|strong="H3605"\w* ignorance \w you|strong="H0834"\w* omit \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* began \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thenceforward,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w have|strong="H1961"\w* forgotten \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*: \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w calf|strong="H1241"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* holocaust \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* most sweet savour \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* libations thereof, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ceremonies require, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* pray \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2403"\w* ignorantly, \w offering|strong="H0801"\w* notwithstanding \w a|strong="H3588"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H0801"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* ignorance:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* sojourn \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fault \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w through|strong="H8432"\w* ignorance.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* ignorantly, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w she|strong="H0518"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H8141"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* pray \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* ignorantly \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* obtain \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8432"\w* \w same|strong="H0259"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* sin \w by|strong="H3478"\w* ignorance, whether \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* natives \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* committeth \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w thing|strong="H1931"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* pride, \w whether|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* born \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* (\w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* rebellious \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*) \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath contemned \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* void \w his|strong="H3068"\w* precept: \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H3772"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* bear \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w gathering|strong="H7197"\w* \w sticks|strong="H6086"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*,

\w That|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* multitude.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w put|strong="H3240"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* into \w prison|strong="H4929"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* knowing \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: Let \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* without \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w stoned|strong="H7275"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.
\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1696"\w* fringes \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w corners|strong="H3671"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \w putting|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* ribands \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*:
